short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Improve your bussu experience when studying japanese. Remove the romaji for god's sake.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: If you like using Busuu for learning Japanese but hate the fact that there's no way to get rid of the romaji on the website, well here's a quick solution. Install the extension and get rid of all the romaji so you can focus and learn more :)
